document_data.name: Protection From Magic Energy
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite document/Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn Game Manual|155}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from magic energy''''' was a defensive [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was protected from all attack-based spells. While the spell did not offer total immunity to damage from spells, the caster received only half the damage they normally would.
